ModMetaData.name: No Colonist Left Behind!
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy (l2032)
ModMetaData.description:
Allows assigning colonists' animals to be designated and put into cryptosleep caskets, so you don't have to leave your trusty companions behind.
- Adds designator for mass-putting animals in caskets (found in Orders, requires CCL to be loaded) - Adds a Large Cryptosleep Casket, so you can take pet Thrumbos with you - Adds a Small Cryptosleep Casket, kittens really don't need that much space - Adds a button to cryptosleep caskets to manually assign animals to specific caskets
